name: Men At Arms [TESTING!]
description:
Note: If you have any suggestions please let me know.:) sorry it isn't really playable either but you can  have a quick look.

Men at arms is a single player shooting game which is in very need of devlopment and ideas so let me know.

Stuff i could be adding in the future:

Menu (90% chance)

Options (100% chance)

Resize the Ak47 (100% chance)

Game going to be free?? (100% chance but you can still donate for more assets)

More weapons (100% chance)

Ai added (100% chance)

Difficulty options (100% chance)

and a lot more.
